Articles.Content:
Here you can show off your fan art of any kind to do with kerbal space program

heres mine

[ATTACH=CONFIG]32766[/ATTACH]

so comment about my art or anyone who post theres on
Not sure if that really counts as fanart.
Why not it took hard work doing it
Because it's a screenshot from the game with a filter applied on it, fan art is generally something you draw yourself about the game or whatever.
It doesn't have to be drawn to be art. It's a screenshot with an artistic filter and creative text- seems like art to me.

It doesn't have to be drawn to be art. It's a screenshot with an artistic filter and creative text- seems like art to me.

That's why I didn't say all, now, isn't it?
Your signature is violating the rules. It's way too big. Might I add that adding text and an artistic filter is hardly art.

From the Rules...

Signature limits:

No taller than 80 pixels, text+image included.

No greater than 750 pixels wide.

No larger than 200kb in total size.

So I agree with Nutt007, that signature is far too large for the KSP forums, please remove it princess venus.
